alert.note: Alert for Chippewa (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 12:52AM CDT until May 30 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL LAC QUI PARLE...NORTHWESTERN CHIPPEWA AND SOUTHWESTERN SWIFT COUNTIES... At 1251 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milan, or 16 miles northwest of Montevideo, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Milan around 100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Appleton and Lake Oliver. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
